troubleshooting.title: Battery Water Maintenance
troubleshooting.shortdesc: Proper water maintenance is crucial for battery operation. Only add pure water to maintain electrolyte levels and follow specific procedures for cold weather conditions.

condition.title: When to Add Water
condition.p: Check if the electrolyte level has fallen below the bottom of the filling tube.
condition.note: If acid needs to be added, take the battery to an authorized Service Station.

ul.li:
Use only pure water sources:
Distilled water
Melted artificial ice (not natural ice)
Rain water (from clean slate or shingle-covered roof in open country)

step.cmd: Add water to maintain level with bottom of filling tube
Ensure plates remain covered at all times

info.note:
Store water in clean, covered vessels made of:
Glass
China
Earthenware
Rubber
Lead

step.cmd: Add water only immediately before running the engine
step.info: This allows charging to mix water and electrolyte, preventing freezing
